/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a vibrant urban landscape. People can be seen walking on the sidewalk, adding a touch of life to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. The colors in the image are predominantly blue, green, and gray, reflecting the natural and man-made elements of the scene.
